column1: In my role at the Federal Reserve, I view financial innovation through the lens of the central bank’s responsibilities —issuing U.S. currency; conducting monetary policy; fostering a safe and efficient payment system; maintaining financial stability; promoting consumer protection; and supervising and regulating financial institutions.
